pkgmetadata.longdescription: UCSF Industry Documents Library API Wrapper // Serves as a R wrapper for the University of California San Francisco's [Industry Documents Digital Library]https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/ API. The API, and this wrapper, serve to pull metadata about of items within the digital library. For more information the API, see the [API's documentation]https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/wp- content/uploads/2020/08/IndustryDocumentsDataAPI_v7.pdf.
